title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: Label font size doesn't change right away when it is modified.
OB: When a label's font size is modified, the height of the label does not change immediately.
EB: The label's height should dynamically adjust to accommodate the new font size when it is modified.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Edit the font size of the label to be 18 points.
